name: Crash Lands VR
description: Crash test dummies have come to life and are on the hunt to kill all humans. You have been on the run for weeks and the dummies have backed you into an old abandon carnival which happens to be ground zero for the outbreak. You will have to scavenge everyday items and use them as weapons to fend off the dummies.The military is on its way to rescue you but you need to stay alive long enough to be rescued.
